Daily Bite #34

08 Feb 2018 — Deden Fathurahman
less than 1 minute read (128 words)

  • SpaceX’s Falcon Heavy rocket flung that Tesla car on a path that goes beyond Mars – Amazing journey for human being, it also put some stuff in the rocket
  • Apple’s Middle Age – is Apple already saturated? i feel it is, they did not have many thing they offer, the iPhoneX is declining, i’ve been bitchin’ about how horrible new Macbook Pro is.
  • The White Darkness – Amazing journey across Antartica, how he surivived on that environment are amazing.
  • We Are Morons: a quick look at the Win2k source – old stuff, but still amusing piece of technology, for people who don’t use win2k back then, it was one of the stable windows ever alive.
